transcript_chunks.text: foreign [Music] [Laughter] it's definitely not he's not laughing with you this time yeah what are your five beverages that you are going to choose to live with until the end of time do I have to count water yes go ahead Kevin water Coke chocolate milk I don't need the other two it sounds like that's great well then well maybe one of these guys want to take you and you want Kevin's extra beverage no no I I called him back I called him back Kevin calls him back old-fashioned and and uh the espresso chocolate milkshake from uh the the store down the street
